text: Valeriy Pereshkura (born 20 September 1977) is a Ukrainian gymnast. He competed at the 2000 Summer Olympics winning a silver medal in the men's artistic team all-around event. ==References== Category:1977 births Category:Living people Category:Ukrainian male artistic gymnasts Category:Olympic gymnasts of Ukraine Category:Gymnasts at the 2000 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Krasnoyarsk Category:Medalists at the 2000 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic medalists in gymnastics Category:Olympic silver medalists for Ukraine
title: Valeriy Pereshkura
